t: Amazon.com: Brand New Morning: CDs & Vinyl
s: While likely a disapointment to ... efforts, Brand New Morning is an early showcase for Seger's exceptional song writing skills that would become evident in his later albums. Railroad Days in particular as fine a ballad as any of his later work. It is interesting to see a then quite young Bob Seger contemplate getting old. This album is a must have for the hard core Seger fan. Unfortunately it is only available in CD-R bootlegs or pricey used vinyl ...
